full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` GDUGS DKAR GYI LHA TSOGS CHOS BSRUNG DANG BCAS PA LA GTOR MA BTANG TE GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES GDUGS @005A *, ,DKAR GYI LHA TSOGS CHOS BSRUNG DANG BCAS PA LA GTOR MA BTANG TE GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS BYUNG BA LTAR RANG GZHAN LA PHAN PA 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS BZHAD RDOR MING CAN SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
